I should also say that 95% of films shot in Manitoba have been on the R1 MX in the last year.

The great thing about the Manitoba Labor Tax Credit is they allow the Deeming of key positions such as DP, so we can in fact bring in anyone we like so long as we have a 'knowledge transfer' within the camera department.

There's a ton of work slated to go that we're co-producing and/or line producing in the next year, aside from our own projects.

We've got close to 2 feet of snow on the ground now, which is not exactly typical for this time of year. But the outdoor hockey rinks are open now, and that is sweet.
